ygData.subject: Re: Why do they want Bronze?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I have ta agree with ya. I disagree with the look - I like the way Bronze looks. But I must be missing something as well. I paid like 30 or 40 pp for a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I have ta agree with ya. I disagree with the look - I like the way
Bronze looks. But I must be missing something as well. I paid like 30 or 40
pp for a banded cloak (I forget, been a month) for my warrior...and got a
whole 1 AC outta the deal, plus a few extra weight... WTF? Don't make sense
to me...

If I find bronze, I'll wear it. I ain't gonna buy it though... Playing a
shaman now anyways... Turtle Shell gives like 10 or 15 AC, which is as much
or more than I could probably get with a bronze upgrade from my banded...
Heh...

-Zantaer/Leod, Fennin Ro, SOK

-----Original Message-----
From: Lemac Justerian [mailto:lemac@...]
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 9:59 AM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Why do they want Bronze?


From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>

I just cannot fathom those that are purchasing BRONZE armor instead of
banded armor. With banded being sooo much lighter in weight, and (nowadays)
a heck of a lot cheaper, it seems silly to me they want to pay so much more
for the bronze when most pieces only give 1AC better!

Am I missing something? Does this bronze armor have some 'special' powers I
don't know about yet?

Some have said they like it because it 'Looks Kewl!' for them... I think it
looks like crap myself... all dull and flat looking... Looks more rusty than
a rusty sword! I like the nice clean look banded gives (especially on Human
Females! Yum, Yum!) when worn.

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: <XxKommiexX@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 9:27 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] [EQ_SMITHS] Somethin seems wrong


> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> scalers are trivial at 41, no way you be popping out the banded at that
> level. Oh ya, no one wants banded anymore, so it is really pointless to
try
> and sell anything. In what I have seen on my server, most people want
bronze
> armor. You can still sell, but a lot more diffucult to do so.
